page.title: 12Talents and Abilities
page.content: We did a survey on talents in families in our area. These are the results: In our area,out of{105}people sampled- {51 had a sporting talent.} {10 had a musical talent.} {40 had an artistic/creative talent.} { 4 had some other talent.} Here are all the categories of talents that people wrote down for us: Gymnastics,netball,recorder,violin, horse-riding,rugby,squash,1st aid,high jump,long-jump,tennis,football, computers,swimming,dancing,gardening, running,mechanics,photography,guitar, trumpet,piano,acting,badminton,drawing, pottery,typing,model-making,singing, cooking,drum majorettes,art,general sports,signwriting,beautician. It seems this area is sporty and artistic,but not very musical.
